description: Exeter Chiefs scrum-half Sam Maunder joins promotion-chasing Coventry on loan to increase his game time.
title: Sam Maunder: Exeter Chiefs scrum-half joins Coventry on loan
title_page: Sam Maunder: Exeter Chiefs scrum-half joins Coventry on loan - BBC Sport
maintext:
Exeter Chiefs scrum-half Sam Maunder has joined promotion-chasing Coventry on loan to increase his game time.
Maunder, the younger brother of Chiefs' Premiership-winning scrum-half Jack, returned to the squad earlier this season after recovering from a lengthy knee injury.
The Exeter-born 24-year-old has made more than 50 appearances for the club since his first-team debut in 2018.
